qas.question: What type of cells have a huge role in brain metabolism?
Glial cells control what inside the brain?

answers.text: chemical composition of the fluid that surrounds neurons

context: All vertebrates have a blood–brain barrier that allows metabolism inside the brain to operate differently from metabolism in other parts of the body. <a0_0>Glial cells<a0_0/> play a major role in brain metabolism by controlling the <a1_0>chemical composition of the fluid that surrounds neurons<a1_0/>, including levels of ions and nutrients.
